column4: Hi all, can someone answer this? I'm running Ubuntu 7.10 on my laptop. It's been running fine for sevaral days, finding and connecting to my wireless network with no problem. Suddenly it won't find the network (or any other networks in the vicinity). What can have caused this?
i have experienced the same problem today, suddenly my card doesnt connect anymore
sorry i had no idea what the reason was. i just did a reboot and now it works
